attributes.action: Make face-coverings mandatory in the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details: Covid-19 is an airborne disease, and social distancing is not sufficient in indoor settings. Therefore, all MPs should wear face-coverings whilst physically present in the House of Commons. This will not only protect the lives of MPs, but also serve the public interest in the form of projecting a good role-model that fellow citizens can follow.
attributes.background: All MPs should wear face-coverings in the House of Commons

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563311
